Welcome to x96_board's Documentation!
=====================================

Welcome to the documentation of the x96_board's project. The documentation will help you get up to speed quickly. Follow the general overview of the project, design of the firmware and design of driver to access.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   overview
   board
   firmware
